In computing, 'Motif' refers to both a graphical user interface (GUI)
specification and the widget toolkit for building applications that follow that
specification under the X Window System on Unix and other POSIX-compliant
systems. It was the standard toolkit for the Common Desktop Environment and
thus for Unix.

After many years as proprietary software, it is available as of 2012 as free
software under the GNU Lesser General Public License (LGPL).
